column1: All towers are tombstones awaiting the thunder.  Hermetic Whisper
Collapse is the last sermon of stone.  Occult Fragment
Lightning does not strike; it liberates.  Esoteric Maxim
Every tower falls, but not every ruin remembers its height.  Mystical Fragment
The crown is torn away so the skull beneath may be seen.  Alchemical Saying
In fire, even pride screams like a child.  Kabbalistic Fragment
